FuncDef: The display srv6-te policy statistics command displays the statistics of the SRv6 TE policy, including the SRv6 TE Policy, Candidate Path, and Segment List.
Examples: Info: If service processing continues during the display, statistics may be inaccurate.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display srv6-te policy statistics command displays SRv6 TE Policy statistics on a device, including statistics about SRv6 TE Policies, candidate paths, and segment lists on the device.
This command displays the total numbers of candidate paths and segment lists as well as the numbers of up candidate paths and segment lists according to the sources of the candidate paths. This helps you determine whether the upper limit has been reached.
